Name: Rakdos Performer, Blade Juggler
Traits: Nimble. The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
Actions: Multiattack. The juggler makes three dagger attacks. Dagger. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
